Welcome!

Welcome to my personal website. Here you will be able to find some information about myself and my life so far, my interests, hobbies, academic life and so on.

Being an army's officer son, my whole life was spent living from city to city, changing schools every now and then. Within the last 24 years I lived in Bucaramanga, Medellín, Leticia, Bogotá and Washington DC; studied in more than 7 different schools and met countless of people around the country and beyond.

Academic Formation

Schools

  • Colegio Colombo-Americano, Bogotá DC, 2005
  • Gimnasio Saucará, Bucaramanga, 2006
  • San Ignacio de Loyola, Medellín, 2007-2009
  • San Bartolomé La Merced, Bogotá DC, 2010-2013

University

  • Universidad de Los Andes, Bogotá DC, 2013-Actualidad
    • Back when i first started, I got into the Industrial Engineering major.
    • For a period inbetween I took a voluntary leave for a year and a half because of my father's job, in which I lived abroad.
    • Soon after I came back in 2016, I realized that what I really wanted to study was the Computer and Systems Engineering major an so, I requested the transference.
